name: hardened browser for Windows
short_description:
The motivation with this project is to start creating a tool that can be use for anyone which needs to connect in a secure way, even if in the machine there is malware installed. The project is based on the code of "Antonio Feijao" posted in: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/7392/Lock-Windows-Desktop?fid=62485&df=90&mpp=25&noise=3&prof=False&sort=Position&view=Quick&spc=Relaxed&select=3139662&fr=1#xx0xx

I hope many people would be interested and join to the project, in order to create a robust tool for free use worldwide. This project is not intended for commercial purposes and none license is given or authorized.
summary: This would be a tool for endure the security online
